pages.title: Netherite Wolf Armor
pages.text: $(li)The Netherite Wolf Armor is the improved version of the $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/diamond_wolf_armor)Diamond Wolf Armor$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can equip it to your tamed $(l:patchouli:pets/revamped_wolf/wolf)Wolf$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:pets/quark/foxhound)Foxhound$(/l).
$(li)To equip it, shift right click on your tamed Wolf or Foxhound while you are holding this item in your hand and place it in the Armor Slot.
